title: NERF Veigar
body: Hi, I have a request. Please nerf veigar, he is too strong!! With Evelynn in a team they are just too strong to fight against. He has 2 abilities which scale 1 to 1. Thanks for your support!

replies.body:
Hi and welcome to the League of Legends board!

We are glad that you joined our boardscommunity, and that you want to be a part of it.
Just a little hint: Unfortunally this is the German-subboard, for the English version try: 

[http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/)

We wish you much fun in the board and good luck in rift.

TheUnknown98+Smurf
Jop. Ich bin ein Roboter. Beep beep
